Debbie:
                 We are looking forward to your new adventure!
   
  Juli

"Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
            thanks
  all of you are so helpful  !!!!!!
   

    
---------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Wiliam Clarke
Sent: Monday, March 24, 2008 1:19 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] For brenda, your box is on the way


  
    21-549 External Speaker

"Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:         Bruce,
  Hi my name is Debbie( from Georgia) Hi ya'll.
   
  I have a question for you..... I have an old 469 model and the old 470 model.
  Can you tell me what I need to ask for if I go to Radio Shack for
  an external speaker for the 469 ?
  I don't really like listening to it with my headphones.
  I am not at all electronically inclined.
  And I don't want to sound like an idiot when I go get an external microphone
  for it.....
  Thanks
  Deb
   

    
---------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of bhali333
Sent: Monday, March 24, 2008 12:07 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] For brenda, your box is on the way


  
    Hi Brenda,

I shipped your 469 old model out this morning, and I included an 
external speaker. It gets plugged into the headphone jack.

you are not far from me so you should recieve it in a couple of days. 
Let me know when you get it and I'll get you up and running.

Bruce
